Comments_List: This course is a great opportunity to explore a topic you may have covered before in greater depth.
Very rewarding experience developing a project proposal and carrying out an independent research project. Developed skills in computer architecture, software development and blockchain technology.

Working with my advisor was great! I think this course can be improved by having a clearer set of expectations from the beginning of semester such as a clearer timeline and standardized set of deliverables.
Independent research project. You get out what you put in.

This course is a great opportunity to work with a professor and explore deeper into an area of electrical engineering you may be interested in. Your experience in the course may vary greatly depending on how much work you're willing to put in and also your advisor's eagerness to advise.
You have to do it to graduate if you dont do ABET, but you can do a project on literally whatever you can think of.
